dd9d31f9-b647-420f-9945-2f4942366534;2018-10-27T08:48:29;Jeux de données provenant des experimentations réalisées par les services de AnaEE-France;dataset;Installations de suivi environnemental;écosystème;expérimentation;facteurs expérimentaux manipulés;écosystème forestier;cropping system;lac d'eau douce;prairie;ecologie expérimentale;sol;climat;gestion des écosystèmes;biodiversité;imagerie;propriété chimique de l'air;météorologie;amendement organique;biologie du sol;flux de surface;chimie du sol;propriété chimique de l'eau;végétation;biologie de l'eau;physique du sol;paillis;gestion des écosystèmes;propriété physique de l'eau;structure;inapplicable;AnaEE-France is the French national infrastructure devoted to the study of continental ecosystems and their biodiversity. It offers experimental facilities in controlled, semi-natural or natural environments, analysis platforms and shared instruments as well as modeling platforms and database Information Systems.

The data generated from the AnaEE-F services are mostly produced by the platforms and, in some cases, by the user of the services. Data produced by the platforms are either core data characterizing the environment of the site (weather, soil ...) or experience-specific data collected by the platform on behalf of the user (measurement of gas in a enclosed platform cell, temperature of a basin ...).
Data are stored in dedicated database IS. According to a FAIR OpenData policy, datasets become accessible at the end of the project and when completed.;AnaEE-France is the French national infrastructure devoted to the study of continental ecosystems and their biodiversity. It offers experimental facilities in controlled, semi-natural or natural environments, analysis platforms and shared instruments as well as modeling platforms and database Information Systems.

The data generated from the AnaEE-F services are mostly produced by the platforms and, in some cases, by the user of the services. Data produced by the platforms are either core data characterizing the environment of the site (weather, soil ...) or experience-specific data collected by the platform on behalf of the user (measurement of gas in a enclosed platform cell, temperature of a basin ...).
Data are stored in dedicated database IS. name: bfab9352-d1fe-5e7b-8c7d-3c71eb743904
notes:
AnaEE-France is the French national infrastructure devoted to the study of continental ecosystems and their biodiversity. It offers experimental facilities in controlled, semi-natural or natural environments, analysis platforms and shared instruments as well as modeling platforms and database Information Systems.

The data generated from the AnaEE-F services are mostly produced by the platforms and, in some cases, by the user of the services. Data produced by the platforms are either core data characterizing the environment of the site (weather, soil ...) or experience-specific data collected by the platform on behalf of the user (measurement of gas in a enclosed platform cell, temperature of a basin ...).
Data are stored in dedicated database IS. According to a FAIR OpenData policy, datasets become accessible at the end of the project and when completed.
title: Jeux de données provenant des experimentations réalisées par les services de AnaEE-France
